articles.title: Klaasen one short of breaking Kapil's historic world record, SA thrash Australia - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Klaasen led South Africa to a 164-run win over Australia in the fourth ODI, leaving the series tied at 2-2 heading into the decider. | Cricket
articles.content: Heinrich Klaasen smashed an outrageous 83-ball 174 to propel South Africa to a 164-run win over Australia in the fourth one-day international, leaving the series tied at 2-2 heading into the finale o… [+2447 chars]
